Member org::ccnx::ccn::protocol::ContentName.fromURI (String parts[]) Use fromURI(String)} or fromURI(Object...)} instead. This is method creates an inconsistency in the API (Strings are components, not paths, unlike other fromURI methods), hence is deprecated and will be removed in future.
